name: StuntX: The Impossible
description:
Hey there Gamers,

StuntStorm Production introduces you with a perfect game to play during this pandemic period.

StuntX : The Impossible is a retro, seriously fun and bewitching extreme game suitable for all ages that's challenges and improves reflexes, alertness, skill and response time. As you go through different platforms..You needs more and more hand-eye coordination and memorize the way you proceeded.

Welcome to StuntX : The Impossible, a stressful situation virtually created especially for you to adapt and improvise...so that In real life all these concentration can impact on your life.
Innovative game for all family,friends and others who can play and challenge others to finish the game while improving their mental acuity
Should you save the world?

All The Best Saviours...

I challenge you to finish the game in 1 hour...

What Makes this game Hard and Unique??

  • Only One Level 
  • No Checkpoints 
  • Time is recorded
  • Online Leaderboard to track the highest Player
  • User Friendly
  • 24/7 Active Servers
  • No In-Game purchase or Any sort of Purchase needed

Join Our Community,

🌌Discord : https://discord.gg/qfSJDYm

🎆Youtube : http://tiny.cc/StuntYoutube

🚀Instagram : http://tiny.cc/StuntInstagram

💸Donation : http://tiny.cc/HelpStuntStorm
